content: पल्लवः --वं {@--1@} A sprout, sprig, twig करपल्लवः; लतेव संनद्धमनोज्ञपल्लवा <ls>R. 3. 7.</ls> {@--2@} A bud, blossom. {@--3@} Expansion, spreading, dilating. {@--4@} The red dye called Alakta, <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--5@} Strength, power. {@--6@} A blade of grass. {@--7@} A bracelet, an armlet. {@--8@} Love, amorous sport. {@--9@} The end of a robe or garment. {@--10@} Unsteadiness (चापलं). --वः A libertine.
